website_summaries.verdict: Outside of some design quibbles, the Nikon Coolpix S9700 puts big zoom power and nice photo quality (snugly) in your pocket.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix S9700 is a 30x compact zoom that captures nice photos and video
it has very good shooting performance
and it has a full assortment of shooting modes from basic automatic to more creative options including full manual control
cons: The S9700's flash is poorly located, as are the stereo mics
Wi-Fi features are fairly limited compared with those in competing models
and battery life can be short if you do more than take photos

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P&S Camera
customer_reviews.text: First Nikon Point and shoot camera and it takes stunning photos. The bells and whistles are way beyond what I expected but knew this before buying, research it. No software cd on the only bummer but you can download from Nikon. This was a factory refurb but it looks and acts new. Quite pleased. Oh, controls are different from other P&S cameras, Kodak, Canon, Olympus so the learning curve will take a bit longer. Very nice 30x zoom capability. Would buy again. Battery holds up well thus far which makes me very happy. I would buy an extra just to be on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Nikon 4ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It's easy to operate and the on board effects can turn ordinary pictures into an extraordinary pictures before you download the pictures to your computer or printer. The video and sound are outstanding. I take this camera with me everywhere I go. The GPS and mapping functions are nice add ons. Another great feature is the 30X optical zoom. The picture quality is excellent.A good quality SD card and an extra battery and this camera is the perfect vacation piece. Con: The pop-up flash can be a little annoying but if you turn it off when you don't need it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Boz

customer_reviews.title: Versatile pocket camera with room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: This camera has amazing features as detailed by the manufacturer. They include wi-fi transmission of photos from the camera to any smart phone, tablet, or pc, also a GPS feature showing exactly where any photo was snapped. Also there are multiple modes from totally automatic to manipulation of aperture and exposure. The zoom works easily and has marvelous carity. The downsides to this camera is the unfortunate tendency of the lens to extend with the cover open when the power button is jostled inside a pocket or purse as well as a funky behavior after recharging the battery that can require removing and reinserting the battery twice or more to achieve normal operation.
customer_reviews.author: William Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this camera - great glass! Just the right size. Wanted a small camera that I could always have with me; this camera fits my requirements. Almost did not purchase because of negative comments regarding the flash. I cannot complain about the flash or anything else. I've accidentally dropped this camera, twice, and worried that it had been broken. Thankfully, it wasn't damaged and continues to provide me with most satisfying photos. Have recommended and will continue to do so. Would definitely purchase again, but not from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: spyder

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures, has wifi to send photos, battery life not great
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and has a long zoom. It takes great frozen action shots when in the sports/action mode. I like that it can also communicate with my ipad to send photos to it for Instagram and shutterfly, for example, but it's a little complicated to get the app and get the ipad and camera to communicate before sending pics. Also, the battery in the camera needs to be mostly charged to do this, which I didn't realize at first and got me frustrated wondering why it wasn't working. And the battery seems to drain quite fast, especially if you use the camera to view photos often or when not in use for a while.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bonsted

customer_reviews.title: I CAN"T BELIEVE THAT NOBODY HAS MENTIONED HOW MUCH THE SCREEN GLARES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small camera that takes better pics than my phone. I read reviews, and loved everything about this camera, it's small, it's got great zoom, and wi-fi. The only problem is, and it's a major one, it's impossible to take pictures outdoors if it is sunny because the screen glares so much. You can't see what you are taking a picture of. It's like a mirror, all you can see is your own reflection in it. More often than not, when I decide to use it, I'm disappointed because I'm unable to see what I'm taking a picture of. I unfortunately now feel that this was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Gert

customer_reviews.title: Took it on vacation within days of arrival and the pictures are great. The night party shots are amazing and daylight ...
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for the 9200. Ok. Took it on vacation within days of arrival and the pictures are great. The night party shots are amazing and daylight clear. Indoor shots, beach shots and flowers at macro setting are also good. When will they make this with 20 mp? I must use another for the higher resolution and give up focal length. Overall, I love these cameras and will use them a lot. Try the panoramic function and be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The zoom is amazing for a compact model
customer_reviews.text: This camera is incredible! The zoom is amazing for a compact model, and the shots it can take are breathtaking! It's still a little shaky in long-range shots, and it can get a little blurry sometimes. Also, the flash can pop up at the most inconvenient times when you have it on auto settings. It's also a good idea to carry two or more batteries for more than six hours of on and off use. But overall, for the quality and the usage you can get out of this camera, this camera is more than a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have found the same even though it's outdated
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. My exact other one stopped working and rather than get a newer one I opted for this one and the same. It is light enough to carry in my purse if need be and I like the pictures that come from it.
customer_reviews.author: Bellyjel

customer_reviews.title: Just OK for the money. Not sure I would use this sell again see review.
customer_reviews.text: Sold with old battery had to purchase new one right away. Had to glue front ring back on- so basically the product was defective. Got it fairly cheap GPS works well.
customer_reviews.author: JT Scheiblich

customer_reviews.title: Canon better choice
customer_reviews.text: Ended up changing for Canon SX710HS Better camera. Hate the flimsy flash on the Nikon. Lot of trouble downloading software........ checking later seems I wasn't the only one! Always been a Canon man. Own a couple of EOS but needed this for upcoming vacation. Should have gone with Canon in the 1st place.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Milner

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures, but I have had a occasional isssues ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures, but I have had a occasional isssues with it turning on and the zoom lenses going all the way open and making a CLICK CLICK CLICK sound followed by a screen display of "Lens Error" . The only remedy is to pop the battery out and then it seems to go back to normal. I do like the capabilities of this device, the zoom is really really good, the video quality great and even stereo sound...but it does have a few little annoying flaws that can inhibit use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeves

customer_reviews.title: Camera 9700
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera, but am very disappointed that there was no manual written in English, as not everyone is Japanese which is what the manual came with it, now it is nice to have it on the computer but not everyone had a computer, or a tablet that you haul around with you every where. If I felt I needed a answer about a function, at least I could have the manual handy with me.................PS Troutman As for other items I have purchased through Amazon I have been happy with. It is not that I am unhappy with the camera but it still should have a written manual with it as it is not a simple everyday camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Missing instructions hinder usage of item and seller unavailable when called.
customer_reviews.text: It might be actually excellent but the instructions were not included so I am guessing so far based on previous cameras owned. Seller was not available when called during business hours shown on sheet enclosed and since an order number is required I used the Amazon number though I'm not sure it's correct as no other info was available. Also the memory card is missing. Will write another review if I figure out how this works.
customer_reviews.author: BaltoCatLady

customer_reviews.title: which results in me blocking the flash and the first take being crap. But it does take nice detailed pictures
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a lot of neat features. Only thing I'm not crazy about is that the flash pops up prior to a picture being taken, and I always have my finger over it (out of habit, due to how I've held cameras for 28 years), which results in me blocking the flash and the first take being crap. But it does take nice detailed pictures. I just have to retrain myself as far as holding the camera goes. Update: Makes a very loud humming noise the whole time it's powered on. I have not done anything to it. Picture quality is still good, but if recording a movie, the movie will invariably have that loud humming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS. HONEST SELLER,
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS. HONEST SELLER, SADLY FLASH FAILED AFTER A FEW SHOTS. Bought another feom same seller, works great
customer_reviews.author: MsRR

customer_reviews.title: Used piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this (used) item and took it with me to Italy. (Still here as I write this). It worked great for two days, and now doesn't. Every outdoor photo is overexposed (washed out) by 3-4 stops. Seems to be ok in very low light, indoor situations. - Total piece of Junk
customer_reviews.author: Help me Mr. Wizard !

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this one until the flash started popping up on its own. Luckily Nikon fixed it at no charge and their service center was a short drive away.
customer_reviews.author: Ala

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacation camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera nearly a year now and I've been very happy with it. I am particularly impressed with its ability to get sharp pictures at long telephoto settings while hand holding it. I took it on our Alaska cruise and got many great pictures. It is light and easy to carry and use.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Dresser

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I was looking for a camera with a good image stabilizer and this one works great. No more fuzzy pictures! The menu is easy to navigate and the camera is lightweight. I love the fact that it has the 30X zoom on it also. The only downside is where the popup flash is located, but once you get used to holding the camera a little differently, it's no longer an issue. I love the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Sue E

customer_reviews.title: Zoom & Focus Problems
customer_reviews.text: Returned it for a refund. Thought the first one was defective because the zoom had a hair trigger. Barely touch it and it zoomed either completely out or completely in. Second one did exactly the same thing. Almost impossible to use the zoom to get exactly the shot I wanted. Also, it had a really hard time getting focused. Many pictures were out of focus. Cell phone camera was taking better pictures. Went back to my Nikon P7100 with its 7x zoom.
customer_reviews.author: G Square

customer_reviews.title: 9700 coolpix not so cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love Nikon cameras, I have had this camera for only a month, I do not like how the flash operates and stays popped up and I could see in the future it can break off. It looks fragile and it should not be, especially for an expensive one. Takes good close pictures so far, still figuring it all out.
customer_reviews.author: GCP1022

customer_reviews.title: Used to take great quality photos - doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.text: This camera took great pictures, but mysteriously quit working one day less than a year into use. It give gives an error message and will not turn on. The lens cover will not open. Thank heavens we were able to get the photos out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Swan

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: totally love this camera. if I could change one thing it would be the placement of the flash because it is located where you gold the camera...but every thing else is wonderful...luv, luv , luv this camera!
customer_reviews.author: L. Trasatti

customer_reviews.title: Terrible camera - failed within 2.5 months of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October 2014 and the view screen failed in early January 2015. Now the camera won't even turn on. Of course, it's beyond the return date. I would rate the image quality as fair, not much better than my old Panasonic Lumix. Albeit, better than my iPhone 5. Occasionally the lens would get "stuck" and wouldn't properly retract. I would remove the battery, wait 20 seconds, re-insert the battery and restart. As noted by others, the pop-up flash is really annoying (something I was aware of, but thought I could live with). I was thoroughly dissatisfied with this camera - don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Newman

customer_reviews.title: nice camera overall
customer_reviews.text: nice camera overall, as a camera.but the flash seems fragile. the wifi connectivity did not deliver. the android app is crushing and generally useless for wifi connectivity. the ipad app works, but can be dramatically imroved with very little work from nikkon. it seems they do not care for this feature at all and have just made the minimal effort they could to be able to say they have it. if you want to easily take good snapshot and upload them to facebook this is not the camera for you. it is a powerfull pocket camera that gives good results and good video fast and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: amihai karniel

customer_reviews.title: CRAPPY FLASH PLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: Nikon really blew it with the placement of the flash as it's in the left corner where you would naturally place your left index finger to steady the camera! Nearly dropped the camera the first time I used it because of the placement of the flash AND the fact that it pops up! I can see right now that the flash will probably wear out soon since it actually pops up out of the camera when it's used and has to be pushed back down inside the camera after use. It's only natural to steady a camera using all 4 corners of it but if you need to use the flash you cannot do that with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Been There

customer_reviews.title: ... of this camera but thus far it is a great camera. This is probably a five but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Still learning the many features of this camera but thus far it is a great camera. This is probably a five but I have not used it enough. Love the wifi set up. I can download to my phone which sends the photos to the cloud and then to my computer, very neat. Images are exactly what I expected with my camera.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: quick processor
customer_reviews.text: Camera has a much faster focus than the S9300 and pictures taken from a moving vehicle are in focus making a sharp picture
customer_reviews.author: Robert Keinath

customer_reviews.title: Camera takes great pictures however
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes great pictures however, the flash design ,placement and operation is a disaster. Only a matter of time before it breaks off. On/Off switch needs to be recessed. More than once while putting camera back in belt carry case the lens opened half way causing a lens error code. No damage done but annoying and potentially damaging.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Body color was a very good choice ( red ) and it looks distinctive
customer_reviews.text: Body color was a very good choice ( red ) and it looks distinctive, my former cameras were always black. So many things this camera can do that I went on line from a firm that supplies manuals ( sales@otcworld.co.uk ) what they sent me was the best camera manual I`ve ever had, we`ll bound and all in English with postage and packing 25$, my last Coolpix was a S9400 this S9700 with WiFi and being refurbished didn't cost a fortune, this was why it didn't come with a manual. R.Wilson
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this camera. it replaces an older model which just finally stopped working after 5 years. There is a learning curve - of course - but she is no techie and she has managed well. I don't know a lot about the technical qualities of the camera other than to say it does everything she needs simply and effectively.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix S9700
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Camera only came with Japanese instructions but is intuitive so I didnt have much concerns although I'm a bit of a technophobe. Also, responses from Amazon customers were helpful in directing me to where I could download the camera information. Took the camera on a trip and the pictures are gterrific.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great photos and very easy to use out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally used this camera and wow! Great photos and very easy to use out of the box. Many settings if you choose to go that route. Small enough to fit in my pocket without case. Great for a point and shoot and great if your more of a professional picture taker.
customer_reviews.author: Clubowner

customer_reviews.title: Annoying!
customer_reviews.text: The flash pops out by itself, if camera is bumped or set hard on a table. Also, when grabbing the camera and touching the top of the flash, it will pop out and needs to be folded back in. Annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: but overall an excellent camera that takes very nice pictures
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to get use to, but overall an excellent camera that takes very nice pictures. WiFi instructions were not good, but I was able to figure out how to link it up with my ipad and the app allowed pictures to be copied easily.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Bauman

customer_reviews.title: ... all the extra capabilities this one has and I loved it. Had used it off the back of ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a COOLPIX before without all the extra capabilities this one has and I loved it. Had used it off the back of a motorcycle for many wonderful trips and years. Now I'm learning this new one and have not had the opportunity to try to send pics to phones etc. yet but am sure it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Marie P.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S9700
customer_reviews.text: This Camera is great!! Small and the image is out of this world. All the features are easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Avila

customer_reviews.title: Good one.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken many pictures using this. But, from the test pictures I took casually in a dim environment, it still picked up the hair on the carpet from a distance and the picture quality is good. Looking forward to try it outdoor and to test the 30x zoom.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great all around camera, takes wonderful photos and the menu options give you a lot of versatility. Especially like the back-lighting, museum, sunset and landscaping options. The zoom if quite powerful and really brings things in close. The price point is good and you get a lot of camera for the money. Performed flawlessly on a recent 3 week vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.  Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: It has a really good 30x zoom for a compact camera
customer_reviews.text: It has a really good 30x zoom for a compact camera. The on/off switchis senitive and if not careful can activate the camera when inserting it into a case. one must be careful of getting your finger on top of the pop up flash. overall i like it, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes amazing pics for a point and shoot. Tons of features and 30x optical zoom. Love it! The Nikon app to grab the pics from the camera to your phone is awesome for quick upload to social media or email. Great job, Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: ConverterJoe

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a birthday gift for my husband, who takes pictures of things like Venus and birds a quarter of a mile away and continues to be amazed at the picture quality and features. Best gift ever according to him!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Nikon with a life of its owm
customer_reviews.text: Takes great photos BUT the camera turns on by itself extending the lense to full power...in the case and even when placed on a flat surface supposedly turned off. I can deal with a camera whose flash pops up at inopportune times but one that continuously turns itself on is ridiculous. I own several Nikons and have loved them all but in the future may turn to other brands that I can trust.
customer_reviews.author: M. DeJong

customer_reviews.title: But the price was very good for a 30x zoom
customer_reviews.text: The camera met my expectations, with the understanding that I knew it does not have a viewfinder that the flash is flimsy. But the price was very good for a 30x zoom, and I know Nikon makes an excellent product--thus, the viewfinder was considered expendable and I figured I rarely use the flash, anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Jean S. Marana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome camera! terrific optical/digital zoom and the better... the small size of it!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Closeups
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great camera but I had to return mine since the flash did not work. (Used but described as "Like New") So I upgraded to Nikon's P-600 which is double the money but also double the camera.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I like this camera when it worked
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera when it worked. Unfortunately it broke down on me a couple of months ago. The shutter doors got stuck and the camera won't work. I have to send it in for repair.
customer_reviews.author: spartandb

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: For a small camera it does a great job. Wanted something small for my travels and this was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Funny012

customer_reviews.title: Hurray, finally a camera with enough zoom and lens!
customer_reviews.text: Takes really nice pictures and videos under all the conditions I have attempted thus far. I would like to find a way to charge the battery outside of the camera, though. The zoom is very impressive, and the lens is large enough to work well in low light.
customer_reviews.author: William Hermon

customer_reviews.title: More than enough
customer_reviews.text: It is more than what the wife wanted but I couldn't help myself. WiFi is neat but I have not used it that much, we usually just move the card between the camera and the PC to download the pictures. WiFi eats the battery but can be turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Leon N. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent camera, but don't expect miracles from it. It suffers the same focus problems as its earlier versions -- disappointingly fuzzy at times. The zoom range is great, and when it gets everything right, it's actually quite good. But, as with most point&shoot cameras, if you want fast, accurate focus and good shot-to-shot times, this is not your camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Paris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great camera.. great pics, compliments how light it is and how great the pictures are.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Liskiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Slow machine
customer_reviews.text: Not too fast in Switching on, takes its time after each photo is taken too. Not a bad camera, but a relatively slow one. Tends to accumulate dust around the lens, which worries me in case some of it would actually manage to enter the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Raf

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a trip 2 months after purchase. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a trip 2 months after purchase. Stopped working after one week, lens error. No way to return or get refunded. Nerxt time will only purchase directly from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy from this vendor again!
customer_reviews.text: The camera works marginally at best. I've owned this same model before and wanted another one but this one was in poor condition.
customer_reviews.author: John Grafton

customer_reviews.title: It took amazing pictures. However
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my trip to the UK. It took amazing pictures. However, in the wind the zoom started freaking out. Since I was in the UK, there is a lot of wind so now my zoom is a little touchy. But the camera is worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca Hofbauer

customer_reviews.title: Would like to be able to control flash but the camera ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the S9100 before this camera so there was not a big learning curve. The pop-up flash sometimes appears when not expected. Would like to be able to control flash but the camera decides when it flashes. The zoom is good, pictures clear.
customer_reviews.author: dgj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Takes good quality picture for point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Takes good quality picture for point and shoot. Small enough to fit your pocket and takes awesome pictures. I got this for vacations where I won't be taking my DSLR. It does good in low lights. Con: Flash - bad location
customer_reviews.author: nassy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: What I thought I was buying was a new US camera with warranty. What I got was an imported camera without warranty since Nikon will not honor the warranty on an imported camera.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this camera. Simple, easy to use, no hassles, good pictures for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bradtke

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: For a grab and go camera this takes amazing pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kalani Smith Sr.

customer_reviews.title: It took great pictures for the week or so I had it
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because it got a lens error and is now inoperable. It took great pictures for the week or so I had it. Also, if you like to take a lot of pictures with flash, this camera will annoy you. Poor placement of a pop up flash. I didn't trust that I wouldn't have this problem again so I ordered a different brand of camera. Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Holland, LMFT

customer_reviews.title: When it works it's great. 4 months after I bought it I had ...
customer_reviews.text: When it works it's great. 4 months after I bought it I had to send it back to be repaired. Lens would not open. I don't use it a lot and it looks like I will have to send it back. Very up set. Was a cheap camera.
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pocket size camera
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pocket size camera. Starts up quick. Menu system is fairly intuitive. Super optical telephoto for this size camera. Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Seelig

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Would still like a better one someday when I can afford one but this will even take great pictures of the moon.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia hardin

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera to slip in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: Great small camera to slip in your pocket. Very pleased with variety of settings, zoom features, and display is crystal clear. Another great nikon product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: I don't find the camera very good in lowlight and it's annoying to have that flash pop up. I would like to control the Flash manually. The camera is a good size for travel. If it's in my pocket nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K.

customer_reviews.title: the better warrior and concert partner u can have
customer_reviews.text: the better warrior and concert partner u can have. BUY IT!!!, its cheap and take cool pics and the videos... OMG... i have like a "maraca" pulse...horrible for taking videos... and this camera fix that issue for you. The videos looks better like frozen and center the take.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. The App is a bit slow, not sure if it interference from other wifi stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for vacation shots. I took this camera with me on vacation because I was tired of lugging around my huge DSLR. It's easy and fun to use and takes great photos. It is by no means comparable to a DSLR camera but the photos are clear and the colors look great. As usual with point and shoot cameras photos taking in really low light were fussy. Day shots and indoors with flash, or sufficient lighting the results are beautiful! For the price, this is a great camera to put in your purse or coat pocket. Much better than a cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Telia

customer_reviews.title: DIAL IN PART WHERE IT SAYS PSAM WHERE ARE THE ...
customer_reviews.text: DIAL IN PART WHERE IT SAYS PSAM WHERE ARE THE FUNCTIONS began to DELETE. I had never past this with a Nikon camera. CAMERA has only three months of use, WAS WITH CARE AND ALWAYS IN YOUR CASE.
customer_reviews.author: cdfros

customer_reviews.title: Quality camera
customer_reviews.text: We've only had the camera for a few weeks but absolutely love it. It feels like a sturdy product and the picture quality is outstanding. Like other reviewers, I find the pop-up flash takes a little getting used to, but this is really an outstanding little camera.
customer_reviews.author: ncturner

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera for putting in your pocket while traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for putting in your pocket while traveling. I am extremely pleased with the quality of the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: the color seem to be brighter
customer_reviews.text: the camera come own why in your pocket I wish the flash say off when I turn it off
customer_reviews.author: Larry baker

customer_reviews.title: Lithium Battery was defective
customer_reviews.text: Camera is fine. But the Lithium Battery over heated and the camera stopped working. Had to purchase locally a new battery. But that did fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: Not weather or life proof at all for a point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Good superzoom but lens got dust within a week. Not weather or life proof at all for a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am simply amazed. I can't get enough of it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: For a pocket size camera, I am simply amazed. I can't get enough of it on my days off. Definitely wish I had gotten it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Spink

customer_reviews.title: At this price the pictures should be better in low light
customer_reviews.text: It only took OKAY pictures, There was a lot of noise in the pictures. Maybe I just got a bad one. Others have rated it fin
customer_reviews.author: Uncle H

customer_reviews.title: Although a very nice camera, the flash mechanism quit working after 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the reviews prior to buying. Although a very nice camera, the flash mechanism quit working after 1 week of use so the camera is already in the shop where it can't be used. we'll see if the warranty service can fix the flash mechanism, but I seriously doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. Needed a great Macro in a small camera
customer_reviews.text: So far, it's perfect. Needed a great Macro in a small camera. This does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Burwells

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend very cheaply made Nikons quality has gone done every ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend very cheaply made Nikons quality has gone done every year. I have bought 4 Nikon cameras in past 5 yrs each one ends up having same issues
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had a view finder instead of just ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a view finder instead of just the screen on back. In bright light it is hard to see what is in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Cody

customer_reviews.title: but not too happy with flash mechanism (seems prone to breaking)
customer_reviews.text: performs as described, but not too happy with flash mechanism (seems prone to breaking)
customer_reviews.author: james ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Defective camera
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was defective. The lense did not open when I pushed the ON button. So, I returned it. The camera did not come in its manufacturing box with no instruction booklet included.
customer_reviews.author: Wimon Deechakawan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! Compact, light, fast, easy to use, excellent image quality, very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: McFarland

customer_reviews.title: So nice and small fits right in handbag
customer_reviews.text: So nice and small fits right in handbag. Easy to use and love how easy it is to download pictures to computer!
customer_reviews.author: M0 Z

customer_reviews.title: a great deal. the camera is easy to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: a great deal. the camera is easy to use and amazingly small for the features, Bought it for the wifi remote feature and 16 mp to try on outside scenes with autocad123d catch. found the remote program features from the iphone to be somewhat basic which was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: John N Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact camera with many features good for traveling. Good range for all types of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Like the camera and it takes good pictures
customer_reviews.text: Like the camera and it takes good pictures. The flash pops up, always have my finger on that spot, hopefully it will not break off!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality isn't as good as the past versions of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mylissa russell

customer_reviews.title: The good and what could be improved
customer_reviews.text: The zoom lens is great. Photo and video quality also very good. Easy to use. Camera meets my expectations. Downsides are: pop up flash is not a robust design. Flash often shoots when I don't want it. Fill in flash is not an obvious shoting mode. Location of video record button is poor in that one often starts a video simply holding the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Fred F

customer_reviews.title: Defective shutter or CMOS. All outside pictures were white ...
customer_reviews.text: Defective shutter or CMOS. All outside pictures were white, inside pictures were very light but viewable. Manual changes of shutter, appeture, ISO had no affect. Yet video worked normal outside. Returned as defective
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. Compact enough to carry easily but powerful enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Don Walters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great camera! often accused of using DSLR discontinued the S9900 is probably as good or better
customer_reviews.author: Rick L

customer_reviews.title: the size is right!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the camera. So light! Perfect for travel. Though more advanced, it's a perfect point and shoot. Not great in low light but use the flashlight app on your cell phone and you'll be good. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. The photos are very crisp. The zoom covers a large range.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Tang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is performing as expected..'needed it for the gps function,
customer_reviews.author: Amy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera the problem is the flash it is to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera the problem is the flash it is to delciate and can be broke really easy. Every time your tunr off the camera and you have the flash off it lose that config and you have to do it every time. Camera good but flash was not a good design
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Castro

customer_reviews.title: High Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Not yet tested, but if it works like the others, then great.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX S9700 16.0 MP Wi-Fi Digital Camera with 30x Zoom NIKKOR Lens, GPS, and Full HD 1080p Video (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThe Nikon COOLPIX S9700 Digital Camera is designed around a genuine NIKKOR glass lens, the legendary optics that have helped make Nikon famous. The COOLPIX S9700's 30x optical zoom lens goes from wide-angle-great for portraits and landscapes-all the way up to telephoto-great for closeups of sports, concerts, nature and more. When you need even more reach, zoom up to 30x with optical zoom and 60x with Dynamic Fine Zoom, an enhanced digital zoom function that effectively doubles your reach.Your smartphone or tablet will be your favorite accessory! Take beautiful photos with the COOLPIX S9700 and watch them instantly appear on your compatible smartphone or tablet. Then share them without missing a beat-text them, email them, upload to your favorite social networking site-it's your choice! You can even use your smartphone or tablet as a remote control for the COOLPIX S9700, perfect for self portraits and group shots that actually include you.Relive the excitement of your travels in a whole new way. The COOLPIX S9700 records the exact location of each shot you take, so you can follow the path of your adventure and every stunning view along the way! Share your journeys on Google Maps, Google+, and other social networking sites, or with the Nikon View NX2 software. Built-in mapping and Electronic compass also help you navigate unfamiliar destinations, and Points of Interest (POI) show you nearby photo-ops like scenic lookouts and historic landmarks. The COOLPIX S9700 is the ultimate travel companion!If you want a compact camera that shoots stunning Full HD videos, the COOLPIX S9700 delivers. Full HD 1080p means exceptional video quality. Record the action, then connect to an HDTV* and watch your videos come alive. A built-in mic records high-quality audio in stereo. Your videos will look and sound phenomenal.When you want to take control of exposure, the COOLPIX S9700 is ready. Select from P/S/A/M exposure modes and the creative options will seem endless. Turn on Macro

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


HUGE ZOOM POWER IN A POCKET.
 Looking for big zoom power you can fit comfortably in a pocket? Look no further than the Wi-Fi and GPS enabled COOLPIX S9700. Its outstanding 30x optical zoom NIKKOR glass lens packs more reach than many bulky super telephoto lenses, yet it retracts safely into an ultra-slim camera when not in use. Lens-shift Vibration Reduction helps combat the blurring effect of camera shake—crucial when shooting at far distances—and Nikon's free mobile app lets you use a compatible smartphone or tablet to see what the COOLPIX S9700 sees, take photos and instantly share them by text message, email or uploading to your favorite social networking sites—complete with GPS coordinates! Slip the COOLPIX S9700 into a pocket and share amazing views of your adventures. 



GET EVEN CLOSER TO WHAT MATTERS
ZOOM IN CLOSE WITH DYNAMIC FINE ZOOM
Every COOLPIX is designed around a genuine NIKKOR glass lens, the legendary optics that have helped make Nikon famous. The COOLPIX S9700’s 30x optical zoom lens goes from wide-angle—great for portraits and landscapes—all the way up to telephoto—great for close-ups of sports, concerts, nature and more. When you need even more reach, zoom up to 30x with optical zoom and 60x with Dynamic Fine Zoom, an enhanced digital zoom function that effectively doubles your reach.

YOUR SMARTPHONE'S NEW BEST FRIEND
BUILT-IN WI-FI FOR INSTANT PHOTO SHARING AND REMOTE CAMERA CONTROL WITH A COMPATIBLE SMARTPHONE OR TABLET
Your smartphone or tablet will be your favorite accessory! Take beautiful photos with the COOLPIX S9700 and watch them instantly appear on your compatible smartphone or tablet. Then share them without missing a beat—text them, email them, upload to your favorite social networking site—it’s your choice! You can even use your smartphone or tablet as a remote control for the COOLPIX S9700, perfect for self-portraits and group shots that actually include you.

SEE WHERE YOU'VE BEEN
BUILT-IN GPS, MAPPING, ELECTRONIC COMPASS AND POINTS OF INTEREST (POI) FOR CREATING AMAZING PHOTO JOURNALS
Relive the excitement of your travels in a whole new way. The COOLPIX S9700 records the exact location of each shot you take, so you can follow the path of your adventure and every stunning view along the way! Share your journeys on Google Maps, Google+, and other social networking sites, or with the Nikon View NX2 software. Built-in mapping and Electronic compass also help you navigate unfamiliar destinations, and Points of Interest (POI) show you nearby photo-ops like scenic lookouts and historic landmarks. The COOLPIX S9700 is the ultimate travel companion!

RECORD SUPERIOR VIDEOS
FULL HD 1080P VIDEOS WITH STEREO SOUND FOR DAZZLING MOVIES
If you want a compact camera that shoots stunning Full HD videos, the COOLPIX S9700 delivers. Full HD 1080p means exceptional video quality. Record the action, then connect to an HDTV* and watch your videos come alive. A built-in mic records high-quality audio in stereo. Your videos will look and sound phenomenal.
*Requires optional cable 









SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES
 * AN-CP19 Strap
 * UC-E21 USB Cable
 * EN-EL12 Rechargeable Battery
 * Charging AC Adapter EH-71P
feature_bullets: Zoom up to 30x with optical zoom and 60x with Dynamic Fine Zoom
Built-in Wi-Fi for instant photo sharing
Built-in GPS, mapping, Electronic Compass and Points of Interest (POI)
Full HD 1080p videos with stereo sound for dazzling movies
